unnormalised: **Decoding Your Desi Digital Audience: Follower Analytics Get a Makeover!**
normalised: **Decoding Your Desi Digital Audience: Follower Analytics Get a Makeover!**

unnormalised: Forget randomly posting chai recipes and hoping for the best! Follower analytics are getting a serious upgrade, helping influencers and brands understand their Indian audiences like never before. Remember the good old days of just counting likes? Those days are *so* 2022!
normalised: Forget randomly posting chai recipes and hoping for the best! Follower analytics are getting a serious upgrade, helping influencers and brands understand their Indian audiences like never before. Remember the good old days of just counting likes? Those days are *so* two thousand and twenty two!

unnormalised: Now, think deep dives into engagement patterns, identifying peak posting times around 6:30 PM (post office hours, right?), and even tracking which hashtags resonate best with folks from, say, Chennai versus Chandigarh. Are your reels hitting the mark with college students prepping for IIT-JEE or are they more popular with auntyjis discussing the latest Bollywood gossip?
normalised: Now, think deep dives into engagement patterns, identifying peak posting times around six thirty P M (post office hours, right?), and even tracking which hashtags resonate best with folks from, say, Chennai versus Chandigarh. Are your reels hitting the mark with college students prepping for I I T J E E or are they more popular with auntyjis discussing the latest Bollywood gossip?

unnormalised: Tools now offer insights beyond basic demographics, analyzing sentiment and identifying trending topics like the latest Ambani wedding. Expect features highlighting fake followers too, protecting genuine brands from paying for dud influence. It's like having a digital pandit reading your audience's kundali! Expect new updates by Diwali, 12/11/2023. This is gonna change the game! These analytics are crucial for planning your campaigns even around events like Holi on 25/03/2024.
normalised: Tools now offer insights beyond basic demographics, analyzing sentiment and identifying trending topics like the latest Ambani wedding.
